segment.source: Installing the UE-V Generator
segment.target: Installing the UE-V Generator

segment.source: Installing the UE-V Generator
segment.target: Installing the UE-V Generator

segment.source: Installing the UE-V Generator
segment.target: Installing the UE-V Generator

segment.source: The Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) generator can be installed on a computer and used to create a custom settings location template.
segment.target: The Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) generator can be installed on a computer and used to create a custom settings location template.

segment.source: This computer should have the applications installed for which custom settings location templates will be generated.
segment.target: This computer should have the applications installed for which custom settings location templates will be generated.

segment.source: To install the UE-V Generator, run ToolsSetup.exe.
segment.target: To install the UE-V Generator, run ToolsSetup.exe.

segment.source: If the architecture of the computer is known, then you can run the appropriate Windows Installer (.msi) file, ToolsSetupx64.msi or ToolsSetupx86.msi.
segment.target: If the architecture of the computer is known, then you can run the appropriate Windows Installer (.msi) file, ToolsSetupx64.msi or ToolsSetupx86.msi.

segment.source: To install the UE-V Generator
segment.target: To install the UE-V Generator

segment.source: As a user with local computer administrator rights, locate the UE-V Generator installation file (ToolSetup.exe) provided with the User Experience Virtualization software.
segment.target: As a user with local computer administrator rights, locate the UE-V Generator installation file (ToolSetup.exe) provided with the User Experience Virtualization software.

segment.source: Double-click the installation file.
segment.target: Double-click the installation file.

segment.source: The User Experience Virtualization Generator Setup wizard opens.
segment.target: The User Experience Virtualization Generator Setup wizard opens.

segment.source: Click Next to continue.
segment.target: Click Next to continue.

segment.source: Accept the Microsoft Software License Terms, and then click Next.
segment.target: Accept the Microsoft Software License Terms, and then click Next.

segment.source: Specify the options for Microsoft Updates and the Customer Experience Improvement Program.
segment.target: Specify the options for Microsoft Updates and the Customer Experience Improvement Program.

segment.source: Select the destination folder in which the UE-V Generator will be installed, and then click Next.
segment.target: Select the destination folder in which the UE-V Generator will be installed, and then click Next.

segment.source: Click Install to begin the installation.
segment.target: Click Install to begin the installation.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: A prompt for User Account Control appears before the application is installed.
segment.target: A prompt for User Account Control appears before the application is installed.

segment.source: Permission is required to install the UE-V generator.
segment.target: Permission is required to install the UE-V generator.

segment.source: Click Finish to close the wizard after the installation is complete.
segment.target: Click Finish to close the wizard after the installation is complete.

segment.source: You will need to restart your computer before you can run the UE-V Generator.
segment.target: You will need to restart your computer before you can run the UE-V Generator.

segment.source: To verify that the installation was successful, click Start, click All Programs, click Microsoft User Experience Virtualization, and then click Microsoft User Experience Virtualization Generator.
segment.target: To verify that the installation was successful, click Start, click All Programs, click Microsoft User Experience Virtualization, and then click Microsoft User Experience Virtualization Generator.
